channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE FOUND LEAKING BY LOCAL SORT AND SET ASIDE IN DMP. LATER INSPECTION FOUND OUTER CRATE HAD NO MARKINGS BUT THE INNER CONTAINER HAS LTD AMOND, Non-regulated mortar powder leaked from bucket: The regulated epoxy in a bottle in the bucket did not lealt PART VII- RECOMMENDATIONS/ACTIONS TAKEN TO PREVENT RECURRENCE

item.title: Report X-2024090212
item.description:
Report X-2024090212

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-05T09:13:49+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-31
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: This is an undeclared hazmat. The box has no markings on it. The box contains a 1X12oz bottle of Purell Advanced Refreshing Gel. The SDS shows the Purell as regulated. The box was found because a bottle of non regulated glass cleaner had a loose cap and leaked. The glass cleaner soiled all items in the box. The Purell did not leak.
